metadata.title: CVE-2018-20359 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in thesbrDecodeSingleFramePS function of libfaad/sbr_dec.c in Freeware AdvancedAudio Decoder 2 (FAAD2) 2.8.8. The vulnerability causes a segmentationfault and application crash, which leads to denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20359` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

faad - 2.8.8-3.2
libfaad2 - 2.8.8-3.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: faad2 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.8-3.2').
